job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pBased on decades of parallel computing research at MIT Neural Magic has developed deep learning model sparsification tools and a CPU inference engineppbrppOur solution helps data scientists and ML engineers sparsify and quantize deep learning models to minimize footprint and run on CPUs at GPU speeds Please look through our GitHub repos to get a feel of what we are about and if still interested apply to join our teamppbrppWe are seeking a machine learning engineer excited to work with stateoftheart models and cuttingedge research as well as with parallel and concurrent algorithms This person will work closely with our technical team bringing deep learning product requirements to our engineers and putting machine learning research into practice within our software If you are a machine learning engineer who wants to contribute to solving challenging technical problems at the forefront of machine learning this is the role for youppbrppFounded by an awardwinning team of professors and students out of MIT Neural Magic is a venturebacked company headquartered in Davis Square Somerville MAppbrppWhat youll doppbrpulliContribute to designing building evaluating shipping and refining Neural Magics machine learning product including libraries demos and notebooksliliPrototype and iterate on state of the art research against proprietary inhouse softwareliliWork closely with customers to understand specific needs implementation details and successful deployment using Neural Magics engineliliCollaborate with a cross functional team about market requirements best practices and how machine learning is deployed in the wildliliBe a trusted advisor and partner providing deep analysis of deep learning approaches helping to define and conduct pilot testsliulpbrppWhat youll needppbrpulliMasters or PhD degree in computer science or math or equivalent experience Prefer a focus on machine learningliliSolid knowledge of machine learning and deep learning fundamentals in particular MLPs and CNNsliliExperience with taking deep learning models from conception to production writing training testing and deploying machine learning modelsliliProficient with Python and one or more deep learning frameworks such as Pytorch Tensorflow Caffe MXNet Keras etcliliExperience working with large data pipelines for analyzing and trainingliliSelfdirected individual who learns quickly and is comfortable operating in a blank slate environmentliliExcellent communication skills ability to tailor technical information for different audiencesliliStrong sense of project ownership and personal responsibilityliul
